Operating system support 261 7.4.1 LPAR Configuration and Management A single system image can control multiple processor units (PUs), such as CPs, zIIPs, or IFLs. Maximum number of PUs per system image The maximum number of PUs that is supported by each operating system image and by special-purpose LPARs are listed in Table 7-12.
